UniprotID	P41143
Accession	P41143;B5B0B8
EntryName	OPRD_HUMAN
ProteinName	Delta-type opioid receptor (D-OR-1) (DOR-1)
GeneName	OPRD1 OPRD
Length	372
Function	G-protein coupled receptor that functions as a receptor for endogenous enkephalins and for a subset of other opioids. Ligand binding causes a conformation change that triggers signaling via guanine nucleotide-binding proteins (G proteins) and modulates the activity of down-stream effectors, such as adenylate cyclase. Signaling leads to the inhibition of adenylate cyclase activity. Inhibits neurotransmitter release by reducing calcium ion currents and increasing potassium ion conductance. Plays a role in the perception of pain and in opiate-mediated analgesia. Plays a role in developing analgesic tolerance to morphine.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
Disorder	0.4149,0.4725,0.5456,0.6227,0.4864,0.3426,0.3149,0.3494,0.3249,0.3392,0.3774,0.3872,0.2470,0.2470,0.2849,0.2129,0.1399,0.2002,0.1969,0.1969,0.1671,0.2034,0.2002,0.1373,0.1137,0.1731,0.3117,0.3807,0.3631,0.3599,0.3740,0.3494,0.3426,0.4507,0.4119,0.3286,0.3249,0.3249,0.2503,0.1611,0.1611,0.0929,0.1251,0.0909,0.0676,0.0349,0.0349,0.0227,0.0134,0.0092,0.0093,0.0070,0.0070,0.0061,0.0048,0.0048,0.0066,0.0060,0.0061,0.0056,0.0065,0.0050,0.0068,0.0049,0.0045,0.0060,0.0060,0.0062,0.0071,0.0074,0.0102,0.0130,0.0146,0.0157,0.0269,0.0248,0.0138,0.0085,0.0070,0.0099,0.0092,0.0095,0.0107,0.0093,0.0160,0.0184,0.0109,0.0157,0.0157,0.0153,0.0218,0.0133,0.0143,0.0097,0.0100,0.0094,0.0119,0.0218,0.0202,0.0244,0.0165,0.0327,0.0443,0.0424,0.0662,0.0258,0.0327,0.0690,0.0483,0.0244,0.0148,0.0143,0.0184,0.0109,0.0125,0.0113,0.0076,0.0094,0.0062,0.0061,0.0088,0.0087,0.0052,0.0052,0.0067,0.0045,0.0044,0.0045,0.0031,0.0041,0.0045,0.0049,0.0048,0.0043,0.0056,0.0076,0.0054,0.0052,0.0044,0.0048,0.0053,0.0049,0.0064,0.0076,0.0074,0.0066,0.0066,0.0113,0.0067,0.0101,0.0101,0.0153,0.0168,0.0178,0.0218,0.0209,0.0117,0.0123,0.0244,0.0174,0.0178,0.0157,0.0099,0.0070,0.0065,0.0056,0.0064,0.0089,0.0066,0.0105,0.0076,0.0081,0.0052,0.0050,0.0039,0.0037,0.0033,0.0035,0.0048,0.0046,0.0070,0.0093,0.0163,0.0294,0.0372,0.0433,0.0341,0.0214,0.0160,0.0136,0.0143,0.0107,0.0107,0.0181,0.0287,0.0483,0.0356,0.0235,0.0205,0.0205,0.0214,0.0120,0.0125,0.0123,0.0079,0.0067,0.0067,0.0056,0.0051,0.0040,0.0048,0.0032,0.0037,0.0027,0.0030,0.0019,0.0014,0.0013,0.0013,0.0020,0.0015,0.0010,0.0009,0.0009,0.0005,0.0007,0.0006,0.0005,0.0010,0.0011,0.0017,0.0021,0.0025,0.0033,0.0031,0.0021,0.0028,0.0039,0.0053,0.0078,0.0079,0.0109,0.0181,0.0364,0.0356,0.0372,0.0531,0.1070,0.1092,0.1137,0.2002,0.1583,0.1070,0.0948,0.0592,0.0719,0.0870,0.0909,0.0719,0.0334,0.0209,0.0134,0.0086,0.0060,0.0054,0.0059,0.0060,0.0059,0.0044,0.0041,0.0033,0.0024,0.0023,0.0021,0.0029,0.0027,0.0027,0.0036,0.0026,0.0031,0.0044,0.0055,0.0070,0.0109,0.0
